item.title: Weak Krone Turns Tesla-Loving Norway Into Used Car Exporter
item.description: Weak Norwegian Krone Boosts Used Car Market The Norwegian krone has weakened against the euro and the dollar in recent months. This has made imported cars more expensive in Norway, and has led to a surge in demand for used cars.
